comments:
I20060512-1600

Switched to the Team Synchronizing perspective. Selected the "synchronize" link that is displayed the first time I use the Synchronize view.
I enter the pass phrase for the SSH public/private key authentication.
I get an error dialog "An internal error occurred during: "Synchronizing CVS".".
Same thing happens when I click the synchronize button again in the synchronize view.

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.UpdateContentCachingService$2 incompatible with org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolder

It looks like UpdateContentCachingService$2 is a subclass of RemoteFile but the server is trying to create a folder that has the file name in it's path. Can you reproduce the problem if you check the project out from scratch and synchronize? Could you follow the steps at this URL. That will indicate the resource for which this is failing.

http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-vcm-home/docs/online/cvs_features2.0/cvs-faq.html#misc_0
I shut down and restarted eclipse and can no longer reproduce the problem.
Unable to reproduce so closing as worksforme.
